title: Chicago Girl Designs A Parkinson's-Proof  Cup
teaser: Lily Born, 11, has designed a spill-proof cup for people with Parkinson's disease. She and her dad, Joe Born, talk with NPR's Scott Simon about the invention she's named Kangaroo Cups.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
